commit.message: Merge #6248 6248: Textmate grammar: prevent early termination of raw strings with hash (closes #6042) r=matklad a=dustypomerleau Problematic sample code from #6042: ```rust #[derive(Debug, Clone, Logos)] enum Quoted<'source> { #[regex(r#"[^\\"']+"#)] Text(&'source str), #[token("\\")] StartEscape, #[token("\'", |_| Quote::Single)] #[token("\"", |_| Quote::Double)] End(Quote), #[error] Error, } ``` Before fix: After fix: Co-authored-by: Dusty Pomerleau
